https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iX2yZlXiRlBAG4MNVkbckWNh8Ol.jpg When a good student named Kamiyama gets placed in a high school filled with disobedient kids, he steps up to the plate and takes a position of leadership. Urging the young slackers and rebels to clean up their act, Kamiyama is in store for a lot of resistance. Cromartie High School: The Movie
